H0.text: What fruit gets its name from its similarity to the locally native word for testicle. Papaya

H1.text: What fruit gets its name from its similarity to the locally native word for testicle. Guanabana

H2.text: What fruit gets its name from its similarity to the locally native word for testicle. Physalis

H3.text: What fruit gets its name from its similarity to the locally native word for testicle. Avacado

A4.text: In Molina's Nahuatl dictionary 'auacatl' is given also as the translation for compañón 'testicle'.

A5.text: The word seems to have been used in Nahuatl as a euphemism for 'testicle'.
